column3: A tool for CNV discovery and genotyping from depth of read mapping.
CNVpytor is a Python extension of CNVnator: package and command line tool for CNV analysis.
A tool that implements an algorithm for optimal alignment of sequences with SVs.
A tool for confirmation of mosaic variants from targeted sequencing.
Personal genome constructor, it can be used to construct a personal diploid genome sequence by including personal variants into reference genome.

A software that implements RigidFinder, a method to detect protein rigid blocks from two different conformations.
